name: Diddit Island
description:
Diddit Island is an open world video game for shaping "the future" generations for greatness. This video game is currently in development building a city for learning and adventurous fun. Diddit Island will grow into a massive futuristic city with unlimited places to explore. Join this journey as you get to experience the growth of a developing virtual island set in the near future.

Note: (This video game is subject to change with weekly updates.)
